predicate.note: Frames file for 'understate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to state (a quantity, for example) that is too low

example.name: with ArgM-EXT
example.text: The Commerce Department found that U.S. exports in 1988 , net of imports , were understated [*-1] by $ 20.9 billion [*U*] a year and understated [*-1] at the annualized rate of $ 25.4 billion [*U*] in the first quarter of 1989 .
example.arg: [*-1] -> U.S. exports in 1988 , net of imports ,

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The Commerce Department found that U.S. exports in 1988 , net of imports , were understated [*-1] by $ 20.9 billion [*U*] a year and understated [*-1] at the annualized rate of $ 25.4 billion [*U*] in the first quarter of 1989 .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Our five-year plan contains three accounting devices -- negative money , an above guidance management reserve and optimistic inflation estimates -- which [*T*-1] understate the spending [0] the Pentagon has committed itself to [*T*-2] by almost $ 100 billion [*U*] .
example.arg: the spending [0] the Pentagon has committed itself to [*T*-2] by almost $ 100 billion [*U*]
